title: Bloomberg Markets: Mathias on Tale of Two Cities in Markets

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Anne Mathias\u0010Senior Managing Director and Macro Strategist\u0010Guggenheim Investments\u0010Discussing "The New Normal: A Look at the Investment Landscape in 2107" from Pershing Insite 2017 in San Diego.
